Articles.Content:
Hello,  hi to all
I tried various flight solutions and only at the beginning I reached a flight height of 64km from the surface the problem is the reentry and the mass that pushes.
Ultimately without back flares of braking is a bummer ok !!
Question where is the wonderful Italian language?
where is it, indeed why is there no possibility to copy the text?
considering this last parameter the game could be followed by almost all the playes in the world, and not by the stupid English language ...
thanks ... for the answers

Benvenuto sul forum, @hylander18!

I can't exactly figure out what your problem is: do you have trouble going to orbit, or do you need the Italian language version of KSP, or both?

Puoi fare domande direttamente in italiano qui: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/forum/102-italian-italiano/

The rest of the forum is recommended to be just English.

Buon divertimento!

no in orbit I can go there, but you want to understand the whole game in Italian .., it's quite another thing, understanding the missions,
thanks for the answers

http://prntscr.com/wk6ki5

 

http://prntscr.com/wk6l84
The Italian version of KSP is available, you can find it where you got the English KSP.

First off, the pictures suggest that is not an orbit, 400m/s is not orbital speed. Not even in space, it's 65km above ground.

[snip] on one of the screens the buttons are in horizontal arrangement. That suggest a really ancient version, prior to 1.1. There was no italian language back then, so I suggest investing in buying the game so it's up to date.

Edited January 10, 2021 by Vanamonde

it may be so, actually not even
the console of the calculations on the specifications of the rockets works for me ..
ok i try to download a recent version of everything
Thanks again for the answers

in fact it must be the first oh almost, as already mentioned the Kerbal engineer Redux 1 .4.1 does not work; at this point to start over which one should I download?

 

thanks to all

@hylander18, where did you buy your copy from? I's an old version, so it was available from Steam, and probably the main KSP site. If you log in the site you bought your copy from, you'll find the latest version, in Italian too.

@hylander18, dove hai comprato la tua copia? E' una vecchia versione, era disponibile su Steam, e probabilmente sul sito KSP. Se ti logghi sul sito dove hai comprato la tua copia puoi trovare l'ultima versione, anche in italiano.
